title: Regional Voices | Acupuncture: The Ancient Art of Healing | PBS
description: Flora Arzanipour L.Ac. explains the benefits of acupuncture and other techniques.
cleaned_text: Healing Special | 43m 12s A Wise Women Lecture presented at the Women's Hospital at Deaconess Gateway, this presentation by Licensed Acupuncturist Flora Arzanipour goes into detail about the ways acupuncture and other related fields of medicine can be used to treat a variety of ailments. Aired: 09/23/15
